CustomField.formula: IF( OR( CONTAINS(Delay_Cause__c, "availability"), CONTAINS(Delay_Cause__c, "connections"), CONTAINS(Delay_Cause__c, "crew-mistake"), CONTAINS(Delay_Cause__c, "driver"), CONTAINS(Delay_Cause__c, "operation-control-mistake"), CONTAINS(Delay_Cause__c, "passenger"), CONTAINS(Delay_Cause__c, "reliability"), CONTAINS(Delay_Cause__c, "special-call"), CONTAINS(Delay_Cause__c, "tm") ), "PRR&voucher", "Voucher only")
CustomField.label: Compensation type
